name: West Palm Beach
description: Licensed West Palm Beach electricians providing 24/7 expert residential and commercial services. From historic downtown restorations to luxury waterfront lighting, Solomon Electric is your trusted local choice.
tagline: The City of West Palm Beach

challenges.title: Historic District Preservation
challenges.description: Neighborhoods like El Cid and Flamingo Park feature historic architecture that requires specialized electrical skills to modernize systems while preserving integrity.

challenges.title: Booming Commercial Growth
challenges.description: The rapid development of West Palm's downtown and corporate corridors requires electricians who can manage complex commercial power and advanced lighting systems.

challenges.title: Coastal Weather Protection
challenges.description: With its extensive waterfront, West Palm properties need robust surge protection and corrosion-resistant materials to withstand South Florida's coastal environment.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in West Palm Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout West Palm Beach including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all West Palm Beach neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in West Palm Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Palm Beach County permits for electrical work in West Palm Beach, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my West Palm Beach home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many West Palm Beach homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout West Palm Beach.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in West Palm Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all West Palm Beach neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency repairs in West Palm Beach neighborhoods?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency electrical service to all of West Palm Beach, from downtown and Clematis Street to the historic residential districts.

faqs.question: Can you handle electrical upgrades for historic West Palm homes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in modernizing the electrical systems of historic properties like those in El Cid and Northwood, ensuring they are safe and code-compliant without losing their charm.

seoContent.heading: Trusted West Palm Beach Electricians Since 2003
seoContent.body: West Palm Beach is a vibrant, historic city that serves as the heart of Palm Beach County. From its bustling downtown to its beautifully preserved neighborhoods, it's a place of incredible energy and growth. Solomon Electric is proud to serve West Palm residents and businesses with the professional excellence they deserve.

seoContent.heading: Understanding West Palm Beach's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: West Palm Beach homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Palm Beach County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to West Palm Beach's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your West Palm Beach Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout West Palm Beach. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Reliable Electrical Solutions for West Palm properties
seoContent.body: Whether you're developing a new commercial space near The Square, upgrading your family home in Flamingo Park, or requiring urgent help near the waterfront, our licensed team is ready. We provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that West Palm Beach has trusted for 15 years.
